content: I'm excited to dive into the Earthsea Cycle. I'm particularly drawn to the themes of balance and harmony, as well as the exploration of identity and self-discovery. I've also heard that Le Guin's writing is highly poetic and immersive, which appeals to me. Can you recommend a specific edition of the series, such as a particular publication or audiobook narrator? Additionally, are there any companion works or resources that you'd suggest to enhance my understanding and appreciation of the series?
